sentences.en: A few scrawny chickens were scratching around the yard.
sentences.cn: 几只瘦骨嶙峋的鸡正在院子周围刨来刨去.
几只瘦得皮包骨的母鸡

sentences.en: a scrawny kid in jeans and a T-shirt
sentences.cn: 一个穿着牛仔裤和T恤衫的瘦弱孩子

sentences.en: And also let the mother of scrawny to eat.
sentences.cn: 然后又让给骨瘦如柴的母亲吃.

sentences.en: And another construction worker is and scrawny.
sentences.cn: 另外一位建筑工人比较瘦弱.

sentences.en: And another construction worker is small and scrawny.
sentences.cn: 另外一位建筑工人又小又瘦.

sentences.en: Christine put an arm around him, aware of his scrawny shoulders.
sentences.cn: 克里丝汀用手臂扶着他, 感觉到他那骨瘦如柴的肩膀.

sentences.en: He [ had ] a long , scrawny neck that rose out of a very low collarWinston Churchill.
sentences.cn: 他瘦长的脖子,从开口很低的衣领中伸出来(温斯顿·丘吉尔).

sentences.en: He also noticed five scrawny children peeking at him from behind various pieces of furniture.
sentences.cn: 他还注意到了五个骨瘦如材的孩子躲在拼拼凑凑的几件家具后面偷偷地瞅着自己.

sentences.en: He looks much too skinny / scrawny to be a weight - lifter.
sentences.cn: 他瘦骨嶙峋的,当不了举重运动员.

sentences.en: He's a scrawny, greyfaced man, who looks half - starved, and he's always very slovenly in appearance.
sentences.cn: 他是个瘦骨棱棱,脸色发灰的人, 活象没吃饱饭, 外表总是非常邋遢.

sentences.en: I'll wring your scrawny neck for you , Will Scarlett!
sentences.cn: 我要扭断你的脖子, 威尔斯卡利特!

sentences.en: In the neighbourhood of the elephant shed, there was a scrawny, poorly fed, stray dog.
sentences.cn: 在象棚的旁边住着一只骨瘦如柴常常半饥半饱的流浪狗.

sentences.en: The scrawny kitten lingered, brushing itself against our legs, and meowing plaintively.
sentences.cn: 这只瘦得皮包骨的小猫赖着不走, 在我们的脚边蹭来蹭去,叫得挺凄凉的.

sentences.en: The vulture extended his scrawny neck.
These big - eyed scrawny boys put out a small newspaper.
sentences.cn: 这些大眼睛的瘦骨嶙峋的孩子办了一份小报.

sentences.en: They were convalescing slowly and lay scrawny and weak in their bed.
sentences.cn: 她们在慢慢康复,但仍然消瘦而虚弱地躺在床上.

trans.tran_en: a scrawny person or animal looks very thin and weak
